> <OLD>
>
>
> Hydras was determined to take the leadership!!!! He moved away of the aim
> and charging his weapons at the max, his multiple heads shooted  against
> MegaSTORM

<NEW>

And that was MEGASTORM's weakness was that although he had quite
possibly the most powerful weapon known to PREDACON science, it took
too long to charge it up, leaving him vulnerable to enemy fire during
that time.

HYDRAS' blast hits him knocking his cannon arm wide so that instead of
firing at HYDRAS he fired to the left and upwards, striking the
ceiling and one of the support beams!

*BOOM!*

The ceiling instantly began to crack and sway as the support beam gave
way! The ceiling and the arch support crumbled and the whole room
began to cave in!

"I don't know about you but I am getting out of here!" HELLSCREAM said.

MAX-B backed out as well. "Roger!"

HELLSCREAM, MAX-B, DIRGE GUN and THRUSTOR all turn and began running
out of the room!

(TAG)

- Preston
